title: Time - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 10/27/21
itunes:title: Time - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 10/27/21
description:
George Noory and author Lisa Broderick discuss her research into time, how it seems to pass more quickly or slowly depending on our situation, if time travel is possible, and how people can achieve a flow state to slow down time.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
George Noory and author Lisa Broderick discuss her research into time, how it seems to pass more quickly or slowly depending on our situation, if time travel is possible, and how people can achieve a flow state to slow down time.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

itunes:summary: An exploration into the nature of time and how we experience it.
itunes:author: Coast to Coast AM
